article.title: Microsoft announces glut of new data centers but says it won’t let your electricity bill go up
article.summary: The tech giant has pledged to be a "good neighbor" as it continues to invest in AI infrastructure throughout the country.

analysis.title_ja: Microsoft announces glut of new data centers but says it won’t let your electricity bill go up
analysis.summary: The tech giant has pledged to be a "good neighbor" as it continues to invest in AI infrastructure throughout the country.
surprise_reasons: （自動分析失敗のため、キーワードスコアで選択）

all_candidates.title: Microsoft announces glut of new data centers but says it won’t let your electricity bill go up
all_candidates.summary: The tech giant has pledged to be a "good neighbor" as it continues to invest in AI infrastructure throughout the country.

all_candidates.title: Apple launches ‘Creator Studio’ bundle of apps for $12.99 per month
all_candidates.summary: The bundle includes access to Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro on Mac and iPad, as well as Motion, Compressor, and MainStage on Mac.

all_candidates.title: Slackbot is an AI agent now
all_candidates.summary: Salesforce unveils Slackbot, a new AI agent that allows users to complete tasks across multiple enterprise applications from Slack.

all_candidates.title: OpenAI、医療系スタートアップ買収　「ChatGPT ヘルスケア」強化へ
all_candidates.summary: 米OpenAIは、医療系スタートアップの米Torchを買収したと発表した。ChatGPT上で使える健康支援機能「ChatGPT ヘルスケア」の機能を強化する狙い。

all_candidates.title: ファミマ、AIで売り場を採点　品ぞろえ最適化へ実証実験
all_candidates.summary: ファミリーマートが、売り場の陳列状況をAIで点数化する実証実験を始めると発表した。品ぞろえの最適化につなげ、業務効率化を目指す。1月中旬から首都圏の一部店舗で開始する。
